      Creates the worker
      Parameters:
      playerName - name of the worker's owner
      workerID - id of the worker
      x - param. x of the grid
      y - param. x of the grid
      color - color of the player's worker
      Returns:
      returns the worker created

    • setWorker

      public void setWorker​(java.lang.String playerName, int workerID, int x, int y)
      Positions a worker into the selected tiles; if the worker doesn't exist, creates a new worker and positions that worker there
      Parameters:
      playerName - name of the player
      workerID - id of the worker
      x - x coord. of the tile
      y - y coord. of the tile
